intro: Dieffenbachia oerstedii, commonly known as the White Knight, is a tropical plant native to South America. It is characterized by its large, lance-shaped leaves that are predominantly white with green veins. The plant belongs to the Araceae family, which includes many ornamental plants known for their unique foliage. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires moderate humidity to maintain its vibrant appearance. Dieffenbachia oerstedii is popular as a houseplant due to its striking visual appeal and relatively easy care requirements.
